advertisements: As soon as the New Scenery, Dresses, Banners, and other Decorations, are complete, the Historical Tragedy of Brutus, or the Fall of Tarquin, will be brought forward in a style of splendour suitable to the Theatre-Royal of a great City.

performances.title: Rob Roy M'Gregor; Or, Aul Lang Syne.

featuredAttractions.attraction: Founded on the highly popular Novel of that Name, by J. Popcock, Esq.
The new Music, a selection of National Airs, by Bishop
With new Dresses, Appropriate Scenery, and Decorations
As performed last Season and the present at the Theatre-Royal, Covent-Garden, to crowded houses, with general Approbation and Attraction

performers.roleNotes: a Country Actor, as performed by him originally at the Theatre-Royal, Lyceum
